item.title: Wall Street analysts say Elon Musk is the clear auto tariff winner: 'Tesla wins, Detroit bleeds'
item.description: Several Wall Street analysts see Tesla as benefiting from Trump's plan for levies on cars.

item.title: Understanding options 'skew' and how to use it to your advantage trading stocks or bitcoin
item.description: The moral of the story is this: If options exhibit a lot of "put skew" (negative skewness), put spreads may offer better risk/reward.

item.title: Watch these stocks that have gone from worst performers to top winners in market roller coaster
item.description: With more room for the relief rally to run, Piper Sandler suggested investors stick to today's market-leading stocks.

item.title: GameStop shares drop 12%, reversing Wednesday's rally, on planned debt issue to buy bitcoin
item.description: The latest sell-off came after the video game chain announced plans to raise $1.3 billion through the sale of convertible senior notes to purchase bit...

item.title: HSBC slashes its Tesla price target, sees shares falling more than 50%
item.description: HSBC's new price target indicates shares declining around 52% from Wednesday's close.
